_sText:
Extract to cstrike/maps folder. Be sure that both the BSP and TXT files are in Maps. Original idea, map, displacements, texture blending, and the bridge are all done by Lost!I just made it a funcional DE map, added some brushwork and made it bigger. I hope you enjoy.

This map uses HDR, has built cubemaps, and has a couple of small graphical bugs. It is small/medium sized, and probably works best with 6-8 players per team. I have included 16 spawn points per team.
